title: Suggestions for a font with a great Y
content:
Hi,

I'm looking for a typeface with a great Y to represent the Yamaha Musical Instrument Company...just NOT the Y that they use in their logo or anything similar.

Something that communicates Japanese, for the masses, yet still of quality. Or if not, just a typeface with a really beautiful Y.

Anyone have any suggestions?

Thanks!
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
Adobe Sava has three different nice ones (each in six weights) for Latin, Cyrillic and Greek. Plus it has a sort of oriental look.

[http://www.tdc.org/news/2004Results/Sava.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720173127/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2004Results/Sava.html "http://www.tdc.org/news/2004Results/Sava.html")

hhp
